title: Strangers in Paradise Vol. 1 (Strangers In Paradise
description: Collects issues 1-3. This new SiP collection collects the entire first volume of SiP into one continuous story! David loves Katchoo, but Katchoo loves Francine who loves Katchoo back, but not that way, because Francine loves Freddie, who doesn't love anybody but himself! There's no other book like Strangers in Paradise, the #1 romance comic in America!
author: Terry Moore
